description:
Made of 100% recycled polyester fleece of superior quality, this sweater can be worn as much for canoe-camping adventures as for long hikes in the forest and especially for fishing!

The quarter-length zipper is enhanced with an inside flap and a chin guard. With its two large high zippered pockets along the body, you can keep your hands warm! The drawstring at the waist and the Velcro-adjustable cuffs will also allow you to keep warm. Reinforced shoulders and forearms provide advanced durability to help you get through the branches and the years!
name: Hooke Tech Fleece - Mens
